The Italy national rowing team represents Italy in International fencing competitions such as Olympic Games, World Rowing Championships or European Rowing Championships. ==History== The national Italian rowing team participated to all the Summer Olympics editions, from Paris 1900, 25 times on 26. ==Olympic Games== {| class="wikitable sortable" width=80% style="font- size:90%;
